data.app_name: Immerse VR App and Platform - DEMO
data.description:
**This is a pre-configured demo app for testing purposes. Contact us for full access to the Immerse App and Platform: immerse.io**

Experience a new way to deliver immersive learning, with our demo version of the Immerse VR App and Platform.

VR training provides immersive, practical experiences for a wide range of use cases including onboarding, safety drills, and technical skills. It boosts knowledge retention and productivity, leading to increased efficiency, cost savings, and better employee performance.

Transform the learner experience and drive adoption:
- Bring all your immersive learning into one easy-to-use app
- Streamline the journey with customizable learning paths
- Enhance the experience with gamification and no-code forms for assessments, feedback and more
- Gain valuable insights into training effectiveness and learner performance

Immerse helps enterprise companies boost their operational efficiency with leading VR training solutions. Elevate the learner experience with a white-label app, simplify immersive content management, distribution and ROI reporting with a powerful platform, and explore a range of content options to meet your business needs.

More info on: immerse.io

changelog.change_log: Added a button to allow users to restart the experience
